properties.text: These are walls. Don't eat walls.
When you eat Nibbles, your trail grows. Don't eat your trail.
Use LEFT and RIGHT to move, UP and DOWN to zoom in/out.
Eat Nibbles to score points, 1 point per Nibble.
Future is much like Classic, except for the following.
Use LEFT and RIGHT to move, UP and DOWN to slow down and speed up respectively. This also zooms in/out.
Nibbles are automatically destroyed after 10 seconds, causing various detrimental effects, depending on the type of Nibble.
Cloud Nibbles - Make your trail cloudy and dangerous!
Flash Nibbles - Blind you for a moment!
Quake Nibbles - Shake the screen for a moment!
